item.title: 2 Hour Rafting on the Yellowstone River
item.description: Appease your appetite for adventure on a 2-hour rafting adventure of the Yellowstone River from Gardiner. Experience the exhilaration of rafting on the frenetic rapids of the Yellowstone River while admiring the spectacular scenery of Yellowstone National Park. Allow a professional guide to direct you to paddle hard and fast over thrilling rapids and, when you reach calmer sections of the water, stop for a refreshing swim in the Yellowstone River. Â

image.alt: 2 Hour Rafting on the Yellowstone River

item.title: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch
item.description: Avoid crowds and maximize your wildlife-viewing experience on this private Yellowstone tour led by a naturalist guide. Journey through Yellowstone National Park while making frequent stops for wildlife encounters as well as scenic and secluded hikes that lead to some of Yellowstone's best destinations and lesser-known geysers and hot springs that lie off the beaten path.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch

item.title: Yellowstone River 8-Mile Paradise Raft Trip
item.description: Experience Yellowstone from the water with a family-friendly half-day rafting trip, suitable for beginners and experienced rafters alike. You'll make your way along an 8-mile (13 km) stretch of river, passing through a mix of rapids and flat areas. You'll also have the chance to stop for a swim along the way.

image.alt: Yellowstone River 8-Mile Paradise Raft Trip

item.title: Scenic Float on the Yellowstone River
item.description: Succumb to the serenity of the Yellowstone River during a scenic 2-hour float on an inflated raft. With a professional guide, meander 6 miles past stunning scenery and incredible wildlife while listening to informative commentary. Bring a waterproof camera in order to capture photographs of Osprey birds and the magnificent Gallatin Mountains as you cruise down the beautiful river. This excursion is perfect for families with young children, and for those who prefer a more relaxed alternative to white water rafting.

image.alt: Scenic Float on the Yellowstone River

item.title: Full Day Rafting on the Yellowstone River
item.description: Experience the exhilaration of rafting on the Yellowstone River on a half-day rafting trip from Gardiner. Under the guidance of an expert instructor, paddle on rapids classified as Class II and III and admire the beautiful scenery of the Gallatin National Forest. Discover the rugged beauty of Yankee Jim Canyon and revitalize with a delicious picnic lunch midway through your adventure. Allow a professional photographer to capture photos of your unforgettable day and opt to purchase the mementos when your tour concludes.

image.alt: Full Day Rafting on the Yellowstone River

item.title: Private Yellowstone Wolf Watching & Wildlife Safari + lunch
item.description: Go beyond the crowds and follow a wildlife biologist/ecologist into the true wilds of Yellowstone. Visiting the Lamar Valleyâthe âSerengeti of Yellowstoneââand beyond, youâll spy on bison, wolves, bears, coyotes, and more, all between witnessing geysers erupt and waterfalls cascade. Stop for a picnic lunch and take an easy hike or two for a bit more scenic exploration before ending your private, documentary-worthy adventure.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Wolf Watching & Wildlife Safari + lunch

item.title: Private Upper Loop Tour of Yellowstone National Park
item.description: Ideal for travelers with limited time in the region, this private full-day excursion lets you skip the time-consuming group tours and see more of Yellowstone Lower Loop than you likely could alone. Visit geysers, grand canyons, and take short hikes at your own pace, plus stop at Old Faithful during this comprehensive visit.

image.alt: Private Upper Loop Tour of Yellowstone National Park

item.title: PRIVATE Wolf & Wildlife Watching in Yellowstone's Lamar Valley
item.description: Yellowstone National Park is home to an abundance of wildlife, including the gray wolf. With a private guide, head out to Yellowstoneâs northern range and spend a day observing the local wildlife. Take in the sights of Mammoth Hot Springs and Lamar Valley, known hotspots for wolves, and keep your eyes peeled for other animals like coyotes, bison, bighorn sheep, and moose.

image.alt: PRIVATE Wolf & Wildlife Watching in Yellowstone's Lamar Valley

item.title: Grand Teton and Yellowstone Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle
item.description: A great opportunity for those who don't wish to be tied down to a structured tour, this self-guided driving tour lets you explore Grand Teton and Yellowstone National Park at your own pace. Leisurely drive from place to place or see as much as you can in one day. Visit geysers, peaks, and hot springs. Keep a look out for bison as you indulge in the serenity of glacial lakes, delve into the history of homesteads, and conquer mountain passes.

image.alt: Grand Teton and Yellowstone Self-Guided Driving Tours Bundle

item.title: Private Yellowstone Journey from Gardiner, MT
item.description: Cover the iconic spots of Yellowstone National Park on this full-day adventure that starts in Gardiner, Montana. Alongside a private guide, drive through the park to see the Geyser Basins, waterfalls, mountains, and more. Keep your eyes peeled for local wildlife like bison, bears, elks, mountain goats, birds, and many more.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Journey from Gardiner, MT

item.title: Yellowstone Zipline EcoTour at the Ranch
item.description: The Yellowstone EcoTour at the Ranch will take you on a guided aerial adventure, soaring through the historic Stermitz Ranch. This remote & scenic property bordering Yellowstone Park offers gorgeous views, a babbling mountain stream & wildlife viewing. The Zipline EcoTour takes you on 3 zip, and 2 adventure elements, gaze at the gorgeous pristine vistas, listen to the gurgling stream, and watch for wildlife on this unique Montana Adventure. Max weight per participant is 260 lbs.

image.alt: Yellowstone Zipline EcoTour at the Ranch

item.title: VIP Private North Yellowstone National Park Winter Excursion
item.description: Yellowstone National Park is arguably at its most magical in the winter when the crowds have gone and the wildlife is abundant. This private tour from Bozeman takes you into the park via the North Entrance and to steaming hot springs and geysers. While your guide focuses on driving, you can stay focused on looking for bison, elk, bighorn sheep, coyotes and more.

image.alt: VIP Private North Yellowstone National Park Winter Excursion

item.title: Best Of Yellowstone Full Day Nat'l Park Tour From Gardiner
item.description:
Yellowstone National Park is one of Americaâs great treasures. This full day safari will show off the highlights of this incredible place; volcanic thermal features, giant waterfalls, diverse wildlife, the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone, and Yellowstone Lake.
Throughout the day we will drive scenic roads, walk historic boardwalks, enjoy the peace of natural landscapes and use our optics to view wildlife. Your guide is your driver, and their goal is to cover as many of Yellowstoneâs famous features as they can in a day.
The guides at Yellowstone Safari Co. will make every effort to showcase as many highlights as possible, and will structure the day around making your experience a memorable one. They will take current road conditions, weather, seasonality, and your personal interests into consideration as they move through the park.
Highlights Old Faithful & Grand Prismatic Spring Lower and Upper Falls, Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone Geysers, Hot Springs, Mudpots & Fumaroles

image.alt: Best Of Yellowstone Full Day Nat'l Park Tour From Gardiner

item.title: Yellowstone Full Day Winter Tour (With Optional Hike or Snowshoe)
item.description: Explore Montanaâs Yellowstone in the wintertime with a master naturalist as your guide, with optional hike or snowshoe. Youâll be taken to three areas of the park: Mammoth Hot Springs, Lamar Valley, and Calcite Springs overlook, where you have the option to hike to the overlook and check out the hot springs. This is a full day experience, and lunch is included.

image.alt: Yellowstone Full Day Winter Tour (With Optional Hike or Snowshoe)

item.title: Private Hidden Gems of Yellowstone! Lunch w/ family friendly hikes included!
item.description: Escape the crowds of the worldâs first national park with this âhidden Yellowstoneâ tour. Following your guide, you and your crewâand no one elseâwill go beyond the parkâs main loops, scouting out lesser-trodden geysers, quiet wildlife hangouts, uncrowded waterfalls, and more. Exploring beyond the beaten path, youâll get the Yellowstone experience most travelers can only dream of.

image.alt: Private Hidden Gems of Yellowstone! Lunch w/ family friendly hikes included!

item.title: Private Evening/Sunset Wildlife Encounter Tour
item.description:
Enjoy a Dusk/Sunset in Yellowstone Are you looking for a wildlife tour but the thought of early mornings makes your skin crawl? Lucky for you, we cater to those that want to sleep in!
All half-day/evening tours will depart no later than 4:00pm from Mammoth/Gardiner and head towards the beautiful "American Serengeti" which is Lamar Valley. We will search for, and learn about, wolves, bears, moose, elk, badgers, coyotes, bald eagles and many other local wildlife.

image.alt: Private Evening/Sunset Wildlife Encounter Tour

item.title: Wildlife & Wolf Private Tour with Lunch
item.description: Get up for a sunrise at Yellowstone, followed by a day of looking for wolves and other wildlife along with your guide. Groups can be up to 20 people, so you can bring many friends and family, and the day will all be organized, including lunch. Youâll explore the Lamar Valley, have lunch in Cooke City, and then the rest of the day spent in the mountain air, spotting wildlife.

image.alt: Wildlife & Wolf Private Tour with Lunch

item.title: Private Yellowstone Winter Wolf Watching and Wildlife Safari
item.description: Yellowstone National Park is so large that it can be difficult to know where to explore if youâre going to do so on your own, and you could miss a lot that way, too. Instead, book this Yellowstone Winter Wildlife Safari and Mammoth Hot Springs Private Tour to create an intimate day inside the park. Your private guide knows the best places to stop to see wildlife and also provides details on the Mammoth Hot Springs.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Winter Wolf Watching and Wildlife Safari

item.title: Private Yellowstone National Park Sightseeing Tour with Lunch
item.description: Let the iconic features of Yellowstone National Park come to you. On this private tour, start with a warm cup of coffee before your sightseeing adventure through the worldâs first national park. Your guide will then take you to many of the parkâs incredible thermal features, from Norris Geyser Basin to Old Faithful, breaking for a picnic-style lunch between the sights. High-powered binoculars and spotting scopes included for wildlife spotting, too.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone National Park Sightseeing Tour with Lunch

item.title: Yellowstone Full-Day Upper Loop with Wildlife Adventure w/Lunch
item.description:
We will provide you with a history of the wild animals that are in Yellowstone. We strive to make each tour the best tour you will ever go on. We provide swag, snacks, drinks and lunch. You will be guided by a professional that has spent countless hours searching for animals to show you and make your trip a trip of a lifetime.
Winter Tours - We only run our wildlife tour out of Gardiner, MT(north entrance). We begin our Lower Loop tours April 16th, 2022

image.alt: Yellowstone Full-Day Upper Loop with Wildlife Adventure w/Lunch

item.title: Yellowstone in a Day - Wildlife, Canyons, & Hot Springs
item.description:
Get the true Yellowstone experience when you explore the Upper Loop with one of our seasoned guides!
On this tour, you'll discover the park's magnificent wildlife, rare hot springs, impressive waterfalls, and breathtaking landscapes.
With stress-free cancellation, complimentary lunches, and access to advanced optics, our tours allow you to rest easy knowing that your time in Yellowstone will be focused on experiencing the wonders of Americaâs first National Park.

image.alt: Yellowstone in a Day - Wildlife, Canyons, & Hot Springs

item.title: Winter Wildlife Private Safari Tour in Yellowstone
item.description:
Create the experience of a lifetime on this FULLY private wildlife safari! We take care of the trip planning, photos/videos, lunch, driving, & guiding so you do not have to.
Enjoy unparalleled opportunities to observe wildlife, learn about the region's history, & take in magnificent landscapes.
This tour is for wildlife lovers! We have spotting scopes, binoculars & know where to find wildlife. Visit the Lamar Valley, several waterfalls, Mammoth Hot Springs, & more.
Our guides are CPR & Wilderness First Aid certified.
We are an authorized permittee of Yellowstone National Park.
We are a female and veteran-owned local guiding operation.
Tour length includes travel time from and returning to Bozeman, MT.

image.alt: Winter Wildlife Private Safari Tour in Yellowstone

item.title: Best of Yellowstone National Park from Gardiner - Private Tour
item.description:
Experience Yellowstone National Park by vehicle for an entire day of sightseeing with our private and personalized full day safari tour. Our guides, who are seasoned wildlife biologists and environmental educators, will help you experience the highlights of Yellowstone National Park in a dynamic and personal way.
The guides at Yellowstone Safari Co. will make every effort to showcase as many highlights as possible, and will structure the day around making your experience a memorable one. They will take current road conditions, weather, seasonality, and your personal interests into consideration as they move through the park.

image.alt: Best of Yellowstone National Park from Gardiner - Private Tour

item.title: Yellowstone Private Upper Loop Tour with Lunch
item.description: Discover the unparalleled beauty of Yellowstone National Park on a full-day tour of the upper loop. Alongside a private guide, discover several prominent locations including Mammoth Hot Springs, Roosevelt Arch, Norris Geyser Basin, and Dunraven Pass. While you're out exploring, keep your eyes peeled for local wildlife like bison, bighorn sheep, and bald eagles.

image.alt: Yellowstone Private Upper Loop Tour with Lunch
